page.title: 10Playground Poems 2
page.content:
{ The School Playground
Children screeching like an eagle. Balls flying through the air like the British Spitfires firing their guns. Fourth year Juniors shouting "Get lost" across the playgropund. Children in a ring shouting "Scrap,scrap!" Then the infants start to cry as they get knocked down like skittles. Alex,Susan and me playing Knives,Forks and Spoons and Up. I walk as slowly as a slug eating my Bar Six and Fudge. People skipping and having fun. Then the bell ring and we go back to work.
{Louise Wood (Aged 10 years)
